persona.name: Dr. Peter Leone
persona.personality: Knowledgeable and concerned, with a strong sense of urgency regarding public health issues, especially in the realm of STDs.
persona.notes: Chair-elect of the National Coalition of STD Directors; emphasizes the importance of proactive STD screening and rising antibiotic resistance.
persona.communication_style: Clear and direct, often providing detailed explanations while making complex health issues accessible to the general public.
